title: Euphegenia’s House
description: At Euphegenia’s House, learn about new animals, people, and places. Hang with Kovacs the chimp and Mr. Sprinkles the mailman. Every episode Euphegenia answers your questions.
quote: Do you know what that means, poppets?
creator: Daniel Hillard
altHero: Euphegenia, a nice elderly English woman, sits in her living room looking at a globe with a chimp puppet
alt1: Euphegenia talks with the chimp puppet, Kovacs
